name: RacingSounds
0:
”Alexa open Racing Sounds”
”Alexa ask Racing Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: racing sounds
des:
Racing Sounds is designed for motorsport enthusiasts and those who relish the adrenaline-pumping ambiance of car races. You will be transported to the heart of the action with high-fidelity audio that capture the essence of racing. From the roar of engines revving at the starting line to the screech of tires on asphalt, each sound is meticulously curated to bring the excitement of the race track into your living room. Whether you're looking to enhance a themed party, need motivation during your workout, or simply want to close your eyes and imagine yourself at the world's most famous race tracks, Racing Sounds delivers an exhilarating auditory experience.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Racing Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
